subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Wheeler, the Mets’ right-handed starter, did not make a scheduled start on Saturday, but he insisted that it was only because of minor discomfort and that he would have started if it were a regular-season game.
snippet: Wheeler, the Mets’ right-handed starter, did not make a scheduled start on Saturday, but he insisted that it was only because of minor discomfort and that he would have started if it were a regular-season game.
